column1: Traffic reports will resume Monday November 20 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75N in Fayette Co:
column4: All lanes are blocked until further notice past the Newtown Pike overpass due to investigation of a serious collision.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75N in Fayette Co:
column4: Traffic is being diverted to the left shoulder.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75N in Fayette Co:
column4: The entrance ramps from Newtown Pike to I-75N are shut down.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75N in Fayette Co:
column4: Traffic is backed up past Exit 113 (Paris Pike).
